ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And the Companions of the Right: what of the Companions of the Right?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: As for those of the right hand -- how (happy) those of the right hand --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: As for the People on the Right, how fortunate shall be the people on the Right!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: As for the people of the right hand, how happy they will be!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And those on the right – how (fortunate) are those on the right!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And those on the right -- how (fortunate) will be those on the right
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And the companions of the right hand; how happy are the companions of the right hand!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: The Companions of the Right (O Companions of the Right!)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And those on the right hand; what of those on the right hand?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Those on the Right, how fortunate are those on the Right!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And the fellows on the right hand; how be happy shall the fellows on the right hand be!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And the People of the Right Hand—what are the People of the Right Hand?!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: The Companions of the Right Hand,- what will be the Companions of the Right Hand?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And those on the Right Hand, Who will be those on the Right Hand?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And those on the Right—what of those on the Right?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: The companions of the right - what are the companions of the right?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [56:27] And those of the right [hand] — what of those of the right [hand]?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And those on the right hand) the inhabitants of Paradise; (what of those on the right hand) and what do you know, Muhammad, about the bliss and happiness of the people of Paradise?
